description.value:
Rite of the Glorious Past
Caern Rite • Level 3

Time: 6 hours
Frequency: Once per season per Caern
Cost: 5 Gnosis (may be shared by multiple Garou)
Requirement: Must be performed within a functioning Caern

Description
The Rite of the Glorious Past binds the memory of ancestral deeds to the Caern itself. Through story, symbol, and spiritual invocation, the Garou remind both spirits and sept that this place stands upon sacrifice, victory, and loss.

This Rite does not summon ancestors or grant their strength.
It ensures that their legacy is remembered and acknowledged.

Effect
When the full Gnosis cost is invested, the Rite succeeds automatically.

Choose one of the following effects. The chosen effect remains active until this Rite is performed again or the Caern is lost.

  • Legacy of Resolve
    While within the Caern, Garou have advantage on saving throws made to resist being frightened or overwhelmed by supernatural fear effects.

  • Ancestral Witness
    The next Moot Rite performed in the Caern gains one benefit (chosen when the Moot begins):
    • Reduce the Caern’s Corruption by 1 (minimum 0), or
    • The Moot’s decisions are widely recognized as spiritually legitimate by allied septs and local spirits (Storyteller adjudication).
    Only one Moot may benefit from this effect.

  • Storied Ground
    Once before this Rite is performed again, the Caern may ignore the Corruption gained from one missed monthly upkeep.

Limitations

  • Only one effect from this Rite may be active at a time

  • Performing this Rite again replaces the previous effect

  • This Rite grants no combat bonuses and does not affect non-Garou
